\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{cache.child.onupdate.overwritetomany}
\label{configuration:CacheChildOnupdateOverwritetomany}
\ClearAPI
Defines whether during an update of the cache the to-many relations should be resetted. Valid values are "true" and "false".

\type{de.osthus.ambeth.cache.config.CacheConfigurationConstants.OverwriteToManyRelationsInChildCache}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{cache.child.onupdate.overwritetomany}}]
cache.child.onupdate.overwritetomany=true
\end{lstlisting}
